description: DJ works maintenance at a cute hotel. His boss asks him to help out and deliver some room service when the hotel is short staffed one night. DJ soon finds himself in over his head and loving it when a big titted TS minx seduces him for hot sex after he drops off a hot meal to her room. Watch as Jesse gets DJ to dance, deep throat, take her fist, and eat her massive load of cum!! Dreams do come true and Jesses hot titties and giant cock make for the best day of this maintenance workers life!!
title: Jesse gives a hotel worker the Best Day Ever!
